questions.question: Imagine that you’re leading a bicycle manufacturer’s initiative to more sustainable IT. Your team has created a list of four actions that they consider most likely to improve sustainability. When you read the list, you feel that one entry is not appropriate. Which of the following actions do you remove from the list?
options: Migrate to hybrid cloud to speed IT operations whilemaintaining secure customer records.
Keep a running calculation of your IT's carbon footprint.
Schedule IT workloads to exploit periods of high renewableenergy in the grid.
Meet with local schools to determine how to promote ITcareers among students.

questions.question: Meet with local schools to determine how to promote ITcareers among students.
options: The tightest possible security for all company data.
Customer access to every part ofthe company's dataresources.
A lower carbon footprint along with reduced energyconsumption.
Sustainable IT along with maximized programmerinteractions.
